titles.title: Impeaching Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr., President of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.
Impeaching Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr., President of the United States, for high crimes and misdemeanors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution impeaches President Joe Biden for high crimes and misdemeanors relating to actions involving his son Hunter Biden.
